officialTitle: Automated Breast Ultrasound Screening in Women With Dense Breasts (BIRADS 3 or 4) and BIRADS Category 1 or 2 Mammogram Assigning BIRADS 3 Lesions to Yearly Follow-up
primaryOutcomeMeasure: Decreased recall rate for screening breast ultrasound while maintaining cancer detection rate
eligibilityCriteria:
Inclusion Criteria:

* Women age \>18 scheduled for routine screening mammogram. Women with Density 3 or 4 and BIRADS category 1 or mammogram are asked to participate in study

Exclusion Criteria:

* Inability to give informed consent
